11#ifndef MODULES_VIDEO_CODING_CODECS_VP8_LIBVPX_VP8_ENCODER_H_
12#define MODULES_VIDEO_CODING_CODECS_VP8_LIBVPX_VP8_ENCODER_H_
13
14#include <memory>
15#include <string>
16#include <vector>
17
18#include "api/fec_controller_override.h"
19#include "api/video/encoded_image.h"
20#include "api/video/video_frame.h"
21#include "api/video_codecs/video_encoder.h"
22#include "api/video_codecs/vp8_frame_buffer_controller.h"
23#include "api/video_codecs/vp8_frame_config.h"
24#include "modules/video_coding/codecs/interface/libvpx_interface.h"
25#include "modules/video_coding/codecs/vp8/include/vp8.h"
26#include "modules/video_coding/include/video_codec_interface.h"
27#include "modules/video_coding/utility/framerate_controller.h"
28#include "rtc_base/experiments/cpu_speed_experiment.h"
29#include "rtc_base/experiments/encoder_info_settings.h"
30#include "rtc_base/experiments/rate_control_settings.h"
31#include "vpx/vp8cx.h"
32#include "vpx/vpx_encoder.h"
33
34namespace webrtc {
35
36class LibvpxVp8Encoder : public VideoEncoder {
37 public:
38 LibvpxVp8Encoder(std::unique_ptr<LibvpxInterface> interface,
39 VP8Encoder::Settings settings);
40 ~LibvpxVp8Encoder() override;
41
42 int Release() override;
43
44 void SetFecControllerOverride(
45 FecControllerOverride* fec_controller_override) override;
46
47 int InitEncode(const VideoCodec* codec_settings,
48 const VideoEncoder::Settings& settings) override;
49
50 int Encode(const VideoFrame& input_image,
51 const std::vector<VideoFrameType>* frame_types) override;
52
53 int RegisterEncodeCompleteCallback(EncodedImageCallback* callback) override;
54
55 void SetRates(const RateControlParameters& parameters) override;
56
57 void OnPacketLossRateUpdate(float packet_loss_rate) override;
58
59 void OnRttUpdate(int64_t rtt_ms) override;
60
61 void OnLossNotification(const LossNotification& loss_notification) override;
62
63 EncoderInfo GetEncoderInfo() const override;
64
65 static vpx_enc_frame_flags_t EncodeFlags(const Vp8FrameConfig& references);
66
67 private:
68 // Get the cpu_speed setting for encoder based on resolution and/or platform.
69 int GetCpuSpeed(int width, int height);
70
71 // Determine number of encoder threads to use.
72 int NumberOfThreads(int width, int height, int number_of_cores);
73
74 // Call encoder initialize function and set control settings.
75 int InitAndSetControlSettings();
76
77 void PopulateCodecSpecific(CodecSpecificInfo* codec_specific,
78 const vpx_codec_cx_pkt& pkt,
79 int stream_idx,
80 int encoder_idx,
81 uint32_t timestamp);
82
83 int GetEncodedPartitions(const VideoFrame& input_image,
84 bool retransmission_allowed);
85
86 // Set the stream state for stream |stream_idx|.
87 void SetStreamState(bool send_stream, int stream_idx);
88
89 uint32_t MaxIntraTarget(uint32_t optimal_buffer_size);
90
91 uint32_t FrameDropThreshold(size_t spatial_idx) const;
92
93 size_t SteadyStateSize(int sid, int tid);
94
95 bool UpdateVpxConfiguration(size_t stream_index);
96
97 void MaybeUpdatePixelFormat(vpx_img_fmt fmt);
98 // Prepares |raw_image_| to reference image data of |buffer|, or of mapped or
99 // scaled versions of |buffer|. Returns a list of buffers that got referenced
100 // as a result, allowing the caller to keep references to them until after
101 // encoding has finished. On failure to convert the buffer, an empty list is
102 // returned.
103 std::vector<rtc::scoped_refptr<VideoFrameBuffer>> PrepareBuffers(
104 rtc::scoped_refptr<VideoFrameBuffer> buffer);
105
106 const std::unique_ptr<LibvpxInterface> libvpx_;
107
108 const CpuSpeedExperiment experimental_cpu_speed_config_arm_;
109 const RateControlSettings rate_control_settings_;
110
111 EncodedImageCallback* encoded_complete_callback_ = nullptr;
112 VideoCodec codec_;
113 bool inited_ = false;
114 int64_t timestamp_ = 0;
115 int qp_max_ = 56;
116 int cpu_speed_default_ = -6;
117 int number_of_cores_ = 0;
118 uint32_t rc_max_intra_target_ = 0;
119 int num_active_streams_ = 0;
120 const std::unique_ptr<Vp8FrameBufferControllerFactory>
121 frame_buffer_controller_factory_;
122 std::unique_ptr<Vp8FrameBufferController> frame_buffer_controller_;
123 const std::vector<VideoEncoder::ResolutionBitrateLimits>
124 resolution_bitrate_limits_;
125 std::vector<bool> key_frame_request_;
126 std::vector<bool> send_stream_;
127 std::vector<int> cpu_speed_;
128 std::vector<vpx_image_t> raw_images_;
129 std::vector<EncodedImage> encoded_images_;
130 std::vector<vpx_codec_ctx_t> encoders_;
131 std::vector<vpx_codec_enc_cfg_t> vpx_configs_;
132 std::vector<Vp8EncoderConfig> config_overrides_;
133 std::vector<vpx_rational_t> downsampling_factors_;
134
135 // Variable frame-rate screencast related fields and methods.
136 const struct VariableFramerateExperiment {
137 bool enabled = false;
138 // Framerate is limited to this value in steady state.
139 float framerate_limit = 5.0;
140 // This qp or below is considered a steady state.
141 int steady_state_qp = 15;
142 // Frames of at least this percentage below ideal for configured bitrate are
143 // considered in a steady state.
144 int steady_state_undershoot_percentage = 30;
145 } variable_framerate_experiment_;
146 static VariableFramerateExperiment ParseVariableFramerateConfig(
147 std::string group_name);
148 FramerateController framerate_controller_;
149 int num_steady_state_frames_ = 0;
150
151 FecControllerOverride* fec_controller_override_ = nullptr;
152
153 const LibvpxVp8EncoderInfoSettings encoder_info_override_;
154};
155
156} // namespace webrtc
157
158#endif // MODULES_VIDEO_CODING_CODECS_VP8_LIBVPX_VP8_ENCODER_H_
159
